approve.description: Sets the amount of tokens that an address can spend on behalf of the caller.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using allowance.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the callerâ€™s address to another address.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance of a spender.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance of a spender.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens.

changeAdmin.description: Changes the admin of the contract.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given implementation address.

upgradeTo.description: Upgrades the contract to a new implementation.

upgradeToAndCall.description: Upgrades the contract to a new implementation and executes a function call.

AdminChanged.description: Emitted when the admin address changes.

Upgraded.description: Emitted when the contract is upgraded to a new implementation.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for an address to spend tokens on behalf of the caller.
